name: Bryce
text: Hi! Did you know that recycling helps save a huge amount of natural resources every single day?

name: Bryce
text: For instance, recycling one ton of paper can save about seventeen trees and thousands of liters of water.

name: Bryce
text: Aluminum is one of the best materials to recycle because it can be reused again and again with very little energy.

name: Bryce
text: Plastic waste is a big problem though, because many plastic items break into tiny pieces that stay in nature for decades.

name: Bryce
text: Recycling glass also saves a lot of energy since melted recycled glass needs less heat than making new glass from sand.

name: Bryce
text: When people recycle correctly, less trash ends up in landfills and the environment stays much cleaner.

name: Bryce
text: Even small habits like sorting your waste at home can make a real difference over time.
